overview:
Mobilestead provides solutions that enable hotels to integrate mobile guest services into their existing infrastructure. The user friendly and intuitive applications revolutionize the availability of information and increase the utility of the hotel experience.

A tourist usually starts their hotel stay with asking the hotel concierge frequently asked questions such as â€œWhich restaurant do you recommend?â€, â€œWhich museum or Broadway show do I go to?â€ The secondary question to follow is always â€œHow do I get there?â€ The mobile device provides the tourist with virtual concierge services to answer all those questions on demand. The guest will have access to this information on the go and make instantaneous reservations all from their device.

The hotel is able to present all their in-house offerings such as restaurants, spa and entertainment services and facilitate the reservation or sale immediately. By integrating the Mobilestead System with the existing PMS (Property Management System) the hotel is able to offer basic services such as express check-out, wake-up call requests, housekeeping and bill display via the mobile device.

Mobilestead presents a platform to deliver 3rd party applications which are crucial to the tourist through one integrated medium.
